Indeed! I have a cellphone, some string (technically, it's heavy-duty electrical wires, but they can be used as string), some government paperwork and a half-finished bag of toblerones.

True, love the effects.

The user below me is not a cat.

CORRECT!

The person below me knows of my top secret Seal Army doomsday weapon, which will be used to [REDACTED].

The user below me eats bananas. And climbs trees.

False.

False. Pizza is delicious.

The user below me is derpy.

True and False. Depends on if I'm on my meds or not

User below me can name at least 3 Bruce Campbell movies.

False. Who the Hell is Bruce Campbell.

False.

False

The person below me built a rocket in KSP

True. Easy peasy.

The user below me struggled with their first rocket.

False, it was very simple.

The user below me is Male

True. Is it hard to figure out?

The user below me thought it was difficult to figure out.

True, I have a hard time figuring out the sexes of cats.

User below me knows who Bruce Campbell is.

False.

The next user lives in the United States.

False. And I am not a cat.

The user below me is a cat.

False, I'm a platypus with dreams of world conquest.

False, I own it.

True, Who doesn't?

The user below me struggled with their first orbit.

I don't know. I had fun with SRBs, though

The user below me has gotten into orbit with only SRBs

True. It was fun.

The next user is going to use the letter 'g' in their post.

False.

The user below me will not use the letter 'e'.
